post.body: little fics and drabbles (not it'll ever be as awesome as yours and @sarking 's work of course XD ) (2)
its really cool watching this grow from the beginning (or as early as I became aware of it) I'll continue to add my own (1)
holy shit you guys are working on another thread? o.O so prolific...
hmm... I'll keep it in mind if I ever want? need? to get drunk quickly then? XD
maybe I have an unfair bias toward it... the boxed wine I mean
are you fucking serious? (this is where someone like Dan A needs to step in)
good point =)
that's an optimistic way of looking at it, I suppose (not usually my style personally)
someone has to change this... seriously, I'm getting a Jon-complex of 'why can't cable news improve?'
AAHHHHHHHH ME TOO *why did I click...why?*
I DID! I kept re-watching the part where she hit him and he giggles XD
but then again I'm not a economic analyst appearing on CNN *sarcasm*
..Ben Stein? public works projects can work,just b/c 'A' happened then 'B' happened in the past, doesn't mean 'B' will ALWAYS come from 'A'
*on CNN* I thought these JOS A bank commercials were going to go away... *sad*
is there some kind of FOX news watching twitter party going on?
Half-watching a documentary called Half-ton dad... and brainstorming fic ideas... still kind of bored
MSNBC.. you're not being classy with the Lock-up marathons here
ok back to Internets and writing... unless someone from LJ wants to chat, I'd love to :)
*has a craving for raw veggies and long, epic fic, but parents are squashing it with their need for company*
I love how they were made in the 40s to show support for the troops over in Europe and the Pacific in WW2 :)
